A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: not enough words to describe the issues with this film. Lacks originality. I get and respect homages but The Last Jedi is a total rip off of Empire and Return of the Jedi. plot holes are huge and continuity is an issue. Not sure Rian Johnson respects his audience or the lore of Star Wars. However\, the film is better than Lucas' version of episodes 1-3\, but not by much. I hope they get it right with episode 9 but my expectations are low
